actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the zero bracket amount.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the income tax, to increase the zero bracket amount for each category of taxpayer. Increases the income levels at which a taxpayer is required to file an income tax return.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the zero bracket amount.
